mapper.select: SELECT medicine_base_table.medicine_code, medicine_base_table.medicine_name, medicine_base_table.medicine_price, medicine_base_table.medicine_time FROM medicine_base_table;

SELECT medicine_warehouse_table.medicine_code, medicine_warehouse_table.medicine_batch_number, medicine_base_table.medicine_name, medicine_base_table.medicine_price FROM medicine_warehouse_table INNER JOIN medicine_base_table ON medicine_base_table.medicine_code = medicine_warehouse_table.medicine_code WHERE medicine_warehouse_table.medicine_code = #{medicine_code} ORDER BY medicine_warehouse_table.medicine_batch_number DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT medicine_base_table.medicine_code FROM medicine_base_table ORDER BY medicine_base_table.medicine_time DESC LIMIT 1;
